goal: 创建一个简单的计算器函数

rules.name: determine_calculator_scope
rules.condition: IF the task is to create a simple calculator function
rules.action: THEN determine the basic arithmetic operations to be supported (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)
rules.expected_outcome: List of supported arithmetic operations for the calculator

rules.name: implement_basic_operations
rules.condition: IF the required operations are determined
rules.action: THEN implement a function that can perform the four basic arithmetic operations on two input numbers
rules.expected_outcome: Working calculator function with basic arithmetic capabilities

rules.name: test_arithmetic_operations
rules.condition: IF the calculator function is implemented
rules.action: THEN test the function with various number combinations for each operation to verify correct results
rules.expected_outcome: Verified calculator function that produces correct results for all supported operations

rules.name: handle_division_by_zero
rules.action: THEN implement error handling for division by zero cases
rules.expected_outcome: Calculator function that safely handles division by zero cases

rules.name: verify_error_handling
rules.action: THEN test the function with division by zero cases to verify proper error handling
rules.expected_outcome: Verified error handling for division by zero cases
